title: Waiting in low priority queue but game glitches
body: I have been waiting for the last low priority queue timer for the 4th time already and when the time ends it glitches and will not let me join the match made game by saying "the active game was not found" then as I continue to wait for another match no matches can be made. What is going on?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time communicating with the matchmaking service. This is often caused by a number of local network configurations that could be causing your connection to the servers to become poor. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if you still have issues.

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.
